property.title: Enable Advanced Footer
property.description: Display advanced footer for adding descriptions and menus.

properties.property: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Vestibulum in porttitor nulla, et lobortis diam. Vestibulum sed dapibus neque. Morbi tincidunt eu velit vitae venenatis. property.title: Display Debug Informations
property.description: Display debug informations to specific usergroups ID. Separated by ','. Example: 3,4

property.title: Enable Go To Top Button
property.description: Display a go to top button on the right of the screen when scroll toward the bottom of the site.

property.title: Go To Top Style
property.description: Style used in the go to top button. You may use HTML

property.title: Scroll Speed
property.description: This controls the scroll speed effect when the button is clicked.

property.title: Enable RSS Icon
property.description: Display or hide the RSS icon in the footer.

property.title: Facebook Link
property.description: Facebook Link on Footer (Example: http://facebook.com/briviumllc)

property.title: Twitter Link
property.description: Twitter Link on Footer (Example: http://twitter.com/briviumllc)

property.title: Youtube Link
property.description: Youtube Link on Footer (Example: http://www.youtube.com/user/brivium)

property.title: Google + Link
property.description: Google Plus Link on Footer (Example: http://plus.google.com/+BriviumLLC)

property.title: Dribbble Link
property.description: Dribbble Link on Footer (Example: http://dribbble.com/brivium)

property.title: Flickr Link
property.description: Flickr Link on Footer (Example: http://www.flickr.com/photos/brivium)

property.title: Linkedin Link
property.description: Linkedin Link on Footer (Example: http://linkedin.com/in/brivium)

property.title: Pinterest Link
property.description: Pinterest Link on Footer (Example: http://www.pinterest.com/brivium)

property.title: Vimeo Link
property.description: Vimeo Link on Footer (Example: https://vimeo.com/brivium)

property.title: Deviant Art Link
property.description: Twitter Link on Footer (Example: http://briviumllc.deviantart.com)

property.title: RSS Link
property.description: RSS Link on Footer (Example: http://brivium.com/index.php?forums/-/index.rss)

property.title: Email
property.description: Email on Footer (Example: brivium@gmail.com)

property.title: Enable Social Media
property.description: Display or hide the Social Media Icons in the footer.

property.title: Button Visibilty
property.description: This controls the Go to Top Button will be visible.

property.title: Responsive Sidebar
property.description: This controls the width of the sidebar in responsive.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Sidebar
property.description: This controls a query toggle to collapse your sidebar.

property.title: Enable Collapsible Sidebar Block
property.description: This controls a query toggle to collapse your sidebar block.

property.title: Enable Sidebar
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the sidebar.

property.title: Change Sidebar to Left
property.description: Change the sidebar to the left side of the page.

property.title: Sidebar Collapse Speed
property.description: This controls the sidebar collapse speed.

property.title: Node Style
property.description: Select display style for forums

property.title: Enable Collapsible Category
property.description: This controls a query toggle to collapse your category.

property.title: Category Collapse Speed
property.description: This controls the category collapse speed.

property.title: Enable Node Last Post
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the node last post.

property.title: Enable Node Controls
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the node controls.

property.title: Enable Category Description Tooltip
property.description: This controls a tooltip for the category description on hover.

property.title: Replace Home Tab as Icon
property.description: This control your Home Tab replace with a icon.

property.title: Display Navigation Drop-down Arrows
property.description: This controls navigation tabs' arrows will be visible.

property.title: Enable Mini Avatar in Visitor Tabs
property.description: This controls a Mini Avatar will be visible next to a username in the visitor tabs.

property.title: Enable Sticky Navitgation
property.description: This controls your navigation sticks with you as you scroll.

property.title: Enable Sticky Moderator Bar
property.description: This controls your Moderator Bar sticks with you as you scroll.

property.title: Enable Login Handle in Overlay
property.description: This will disable the normal XenForo login handle drop down and enable a overlay for logging in.

property.title: Enable Navigation Bar Login
property.description: This display Log in or Sign up as navigation link.

property.title: Enable Sub-Navigation
property.description: This will remove the selected sub-navigation tab links and move it into a dropdown.

property.title: Enable Breadcrumb on Forum Index
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the breadcrumb on Forum Index.

property.title: Enable Bottom Breadcrumb
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the bottom breadcrumb.

property.title: Breadcrumb Height
property.description: This controls the height of the breadcrumb. Default XenForo uses 24px.

property.title: Display Sidebar Icons
property.description: This controls a icon next to sidebar heading.

property.title: Enable Title on Forum Index & Portal
property.description: Allows you to enable/disable the title bar on Forum Index & Portal.

property.title: Avatar Style
property.description: Shape of member avatar

property.title: Custom Favicon
property.description: URL to a 16px x 16px PNG/GIF image that will represent your website's favicon.

property.title: Enable Stylium Setting
property.description: Turn on Stylium Setting Panel at Front-End.

property.title: Font
property.description: Select default font for font style selectors

property.title: Body Background Size
property.description: Css3 property, list of value: auto|length|cover|contain|initial|inherit (pick one).

property.title: Body Background Image
property.description: Path to your background image. Path can relative with your XenForo root directory

property.title: Body Background Repeat
property.description: The background-repeat property sets if/how a background image will be repeated. List value: repeat|repeat-x|repeat-y|no-repeat|initial|inherit (pick one).

property.title: Body Background Position
property.description: The background-position property sets the starting position of a background image.

property.title: Text Selection
property.description: When you select text, by clicking and dragging, this is how it will display. The ::selection selector matches the portion of an element that is selected by a user.

property.title: Enable Font
property.description: Enable font chooser.

property.title: Enable Layout Change
property.description: Enable layout selector.

property.title: Boxed Wrapper Style
property.description: Style for wrapper in boxed layout

property.title: Font Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that font setting applies to. (e.g. .titleBar h1).

property.title: Body Background Color Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that body background color applies to.

property.title: Primary Color Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that primary color applies to.

properties.property: .breadcrumb .crust:last-child a.crumb, .navigationSideBar a:hover, body .xenOverlay.memberCard .userInfo h3 a, body .xenOverlay.memberCard .userLinks, .primaryContent a, .PageNav a:hover, .PageNav a:focus, .footer a:active, .navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink, .navTabs .navTab.selected .navLink:hover, .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:hover, .navTabs .navTab.selected .tabLinks a:focus, .sidebar .visitorPanel .username, .node .unread .nodeText .nodeTitle, .node .subForumList .unread .nodeTitle, .subForumsMenu .node .unread .nodeTitle, .navTabs .navTab.selected .SplitCtrl:before, #logo .fa

property.title: Primary Color Background Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that primary color applies to.

properties.property: #header, .footer .pageContent, .resourceListItem .resourceImage .resourceIcon img, .resourceInfo .resourceImage .resourceIcon, #searchBar.hasSearchButton #QuickSearch .primaryControls .fa-search, .resourceListItem .resourceImage .resourceIcon img, .avatar img, .avatar .img, .avatarCropper, .heading, .xenForm .formHeader, .Popup .PopupControl.PopupOpen, .Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen, .navTabs .navTab.Popup.PopupContainerControl.PopupOpen, .dataTable caption, .navTabs .navTab.selected.PopupOpen .navLink, a.callToAction span, .avatarScaler img, .xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatar img, .xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatar .img, .xenOverlay .formOverlay .avatarCropper, .styliumBoxedCover #navigation.activeSticky .styliumStickyWrapper, .styliumWide #navigation.activeSticky .styliumStickyWrapper

property.title: Primary Color Border Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that primary color applies to.

property.title: Primary Color Border Top Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that primary color applies to.

property.title: Secondary Color Border Top Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that secondary color applies to.

property.title: Tertiary Color Border Top Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that tertiary color applies to.

property.title: Secondary Color Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that secondary color applies to.

property.title: Secondary Color Background Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that secondary color applies to.

property.title: Secondary Color Border Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that secondary color applies to.

property.title: Tertiary Color Border Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that tertiary color applies to.

property.title: Tertiary Color Background Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that tertiary color applies to.

property.title: Tertiary Color Selectors
property.description: Selects elements that tertiary color applies to.

property.title: Enable Background Patterns
property.description: Enable body pattern background chooser.

property.title: Enable Background Images
property.description: Enable body images background chooser.

property.title: Image Source
property.description: Path to your background image folder. Path can relative with your XenForo root directory. Include patternx.png (x from 1 to 10). bkgdy.jpg( y from 1 to 5).

property.title: Enable Color Picker
property.description: Enable color picker.

property.title: Remove Gradients Background
property.description: Remove gradient background from selectors has gradients bg.

property.title: Google Fonts Variants
property.description: Select google fonts variants.

property.title: Sidebar Block Collapse Trigger Class
property.description: Using Font Awesome class

property.title: Sidebar Block Expand Trigger Class
property.description: Using Font Awesome class

property.title: Category Collapse Trigger Class
property.description: Using Font Awesome class

property.title: Category Expand Trigger Class
property.description: Using Font Awesome class

property.title: Gradient Background Class
property.description: Selects elements to remove gradient background.

group.title: [Stylium] General
group.description: General options and settings for the framework.

group.title: [Stylium] Nodes
group.description: Style properties that customize the elements within nodes

group.title: [Stylium] Sidebar
group.description: Style properties that customize the sidebar.

group.title: [Stylium] Footer
group.description: Style properties that customize the footer.

group.title: [Stylium] Header & Navigation
group.description: Style properties that customize the header & navigation

group.title: [Stylium] Styler
group.description: General customize style for the framework.

group.title: [Stylium] Setting
group.description: Style properties that customize the stylium setting panel.

group.title: [Stylium] Social
group.description: Style properties that customize the social content.

<link rel="stylesheet" href="css.php?css=stylium,stylium_modified_css,stylium_extra_css&style={xen:urlencode $_styleId}&dir={$visitorLanguage.text_direction}&d={$visitorStyle.last_modified_date}" />

<xen:if is="{$systemFont} && !in_array({$styliumValue.font},{$systemFont})">
	<link href='//fonts.googleapis.com/css?family={$styliumValue.font}:{$styliumValue.fontVariants}&subset=latin,greek,vietnamese' id='styliumLoadedFont' rel='stylesheet' type='text/css'>
</xen:if>

<xen:if is="{$canUseStyliumSetting} && {xen:property stylium_settingEnable}">
	<link rel="stylesheet" href="{$javaScriptSource}/brivium/stylium/1000000/css/colpick.css" />
	<script src="{$javaScriptSource}/brivium/stylium/1000000/js/colpick.js?_v={$xenOptions.jsVersion}"></script>
</xen:if>
<xen:if is="{$styliumValue}">
<style type="text/css">
		<xen:if is="{$styliumValue.bodyBgColor}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, 'body, #styliumSetting .styliumBodyBackgroundColor, {xen:property stylium_bodyBgColorSelectors}'}{
			background-color: {$styliumValue.bodyBgColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_fontSelectors} && {$styliumValue.font}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_fontSelectors}'}{
			font-family: {$styliumValue.font}, arial,helvetica,clean,sans-serif;
		}
		</xen:if>
		body{
			background-image: url({$styliumValue.bodyBgImage});
			-webkit-background-size: {$styliumValue.bodyBgSize};
			-moz-background-size: {$styliumValue.bodyBgSize};
			-o-background-size: {$styliumValue.bodyBgSize};
			background-size: {$styliumValue.bodyBgSize};
			background-position: {$styliumValue.bodyBgPosition};
			background-repeat: {$styliumValue.bodyBgRepeat};
		}
		<xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_primaryColorSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_primaryColorSelectors}'}{
			color: {$styliumValue.primaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if>
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '#styliumSetting .styliumPrimaryColor, {xen:property stylium_primaryColorBgSelectors}'}{
			background-color: {$styliumValue.primaryColor};
		}
		<xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderSelectors}'}{
			border-color: {$styliumValue.primaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderTopSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderTopSelectors}'}{
			border-top-color: {$styliumValue.primaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorSelectors}'}{
			color: {$styliumValue.secondaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if>
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '#styliumSetting .styliumSecondaryColor, {xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBgSelectors}'}{
			background-color: {$styliumValue.secondaryColor};
		}
		<xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderSelectors}'}{
			border-color: {$styliumValue.secondaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderTopSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderTopSelectors}'}{
			border-top-color: {$styliumValue.secondaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorSelectors}'}{
			color: {$styliumValue.tertiaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if>
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '#styliumSetting .styliumTertiaryColor, {xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBgSelectors}'}{
			background-color: {$styliumValue.tertiaryColor};
		}
		<xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderSelectors}'}{
			border-color: {$styliumValue.tertiaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if><xen:if is="{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderTopSelectors}">
		{xen:helper brsf_selectorclean, '{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderTopSelectors}'}{
			border-top-color: {$styliumValue.tertiaryColor};
		}
		</xen:if>
</style>
</xen:if>

jQuery.extend(true, Stylium, { _settingEnable: "{xen:property stylium_settingEnable}", _imagePath: "{$javaScriptSource}/brivium/stylium/1000000/img", _boardUrl: "{$xenOptions.boardUrl}", _settingEnable: "{xen:property stylium_settingEnable}", _mainContainerMargin: '{xen:calc '{xen:property sidebar.width} + 10'}px', _maxResponsiveWideWidth: "{xen:property maxResponsiveWideWidth}", _maxResponsiveMediumWidth: "{xen:property maxResponsiveMediumWidth}", _maxResponsiveNarrowWidth: "{xen:property maxResponsiveNarrowWidth}", _collapsibleCategory: "{xen:property stylium_collapsibleCategory}", _categoryCollapseSpeed: "{xen:property stylium_categoryCollapseSpeed}", _footerGoToTop: "{xen:property stylium_footerGoToTop}", _footerGoToTopVisibilty: "{xen:property stylium_footerGoToTopVisibilty}", _footerGoToTopSpeed: "{xen:property stylium_footerGoToTopSpeed}", _collapsibleSidebar: "{xen:property stylium_collapsibleSidebar}", _collapsibleSidebarBlock: "{xen:property stylium_collapsibleSidebarBlock}",
_homeTabIcon: "{xen:property stylium_homeTabIcon}", _navDropdownArrows: "{xen:property stylium_navDropdownArrows}", _subNavigation: "{xen:property stylium_subNavigation}", _stickyHeader: "{xen:property stylium_stickyHeader}", _stickyModerator: "{xen:property stylium_stickyModerator}",
_sidebarBlockCollapseTriggerClass: "{xen:property stylium_sidebarBlockCollapseTriggerClass}", _sidebarBlockExpandTriggerClass: "{xen:property stylium_sidebarBlockExpandTriggerClass}", _categoryCollapseTriggerClass: "{xen:property stylium_categoryCollapseTriggerClass}", _categoryExpandTriggerClass: "{xen:property stylium_categoryExpandTriggerClass}",
settingSelectors: { font : "{xen:property stylium_fontSelectors}", bodyBgColor : "body, #styliumSetting .styliumBodyBackgroundColor, {xen:property stylium_bodyBgColorSelectors}", bodyBgImage : 'body', bodyBgSize : 'body', bodyBgPosition : 'body', bodyBgRepeat : 'body',
primaryColor : "{xen:property stylium_primaryColorSelectors}", primaryColorBg : "#styliumSetting .styliumPrimaryColor, {xen:property stylium_primaryColorBgSelectors}", primaryColorBorder : "{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderSelectors}", primaryColorBorderTop : "{xen:property stylium_primaryColorBorderTopSelectors}",
secondaryColor : "{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorSelectors}", secondaryColorBg : "#styliumSetting .styliumSecondaryColor, {xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBgSelectors}", secondaryColorBorder : "{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderSelectors}", secondaryColorBorderTop : "{xen:property stylium_secondaryColorBorderTopSelectors}",
tertiaryColor : "{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorSelectors}", tertiaryColorBg : "#styliumSetting .styliumTertiaryColor, {xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBgSelectors}", tertiaryColorBorder : "{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderSelectors}", tertiaryColorBorderTop : "{xen:property stylium_tertiaryColorBorderTopSelectors}" }, settingDefaultValues: { <xen:if is="{$settingDefaultValues}"> <xen:foreach loop="$settingDefaultValues" key="$propertyName" value="$propertyValue"> {$propertyName} : "{$propertyValue}", </xen:foreach> </xen:if> } });
Stylium.settingCustomValues = { <xen:if is="{$settingCustomValues}"> <xen:foreach loop="$settingCustomValues" key="$propertyName" value="$propertyValue"> {$propertyName} : "{$propertyValue}", </xen:foreach> </xen:if> };
jQuery.extend(XenForo.phrases, { BRSF_collapse: "{xen:jsescape {xen:phrase BRSF_collapse}}" }); <xen:if is="{$settingCustomValues.bodyBgSize}=='cover' || (!{$settingCustomValues.bodyBgImage} && {$styliumValue.bodyBgSize}=='cover')"> $.backstretch('{$styliumValue.bodyBgImage}'); </xen:if>
